title: Rescheduled time table for trains on Kelani Valley line
body_lines: The Railway Department announced that with the addition of a new train on the Kelani Valley Railway Line from tomorrow (15) to Colombo Fort, the time table has been slightly revised.
Accordingly, the new train will leave Waga Railway Station at 6.20 am and will leave Colombo Fort Railway Station at 4.00 pm from tomorrow. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
